title: Legacy Ryze skins missing.
body:
Logged in today to check out Ryze and noticed that most of my skins are gone. Prior to the patch I owned Tribal, Professor, and Pirate, and now they're just...not there.

Luckily I'm not much of a Ryze player but  if you guys can check into this, that'd be awesome!

replies.body: Zombie Ryze was not showing up for me when I searched it, but it was there when I pick Ryze in an actual game
Yea, Zombie Ryze is not showing up for me either. Is it true that Riot Games just took away the splash art?

Ryze was updated in patch 6.14. Skins that you own for him might show up as "Unavailable" on your profile tab. Not to worry though, this is only a visual bug, as during champion select you will still be able to select any skin that you own for Ryze. :)
Yeah, i had professor ryze, and it was not showing up either, thank god i thought Riot took it away because i just didnt play ryze much or something
